prompt:
What type of content should I include when writing an article about a specific topic?
When writing an article about a specific topic, you should aim to include a variety of different types of content. For example, you could include images or videos that illustrate key points in the article; infographics that help summarize complex information; statistics or data visualizations that back up your claims; and even interviews with experts in the field who can provide additional insights or perspectives on the topic at hand.
